problem_names:
lemma prefix_finI_item[intro!]:
    assumes "a = b" "u \<le> v"
    shows "a # u \<le> b # v"

lemma prefix_finE_item[elim!]:
    assumes "a # u \<le> b # v"
    obtains "a = b" "u \<le> v"

lemma pprefix_fin_length[dest]:
    assumes "u < v"
    shows "length u < length v"
translations:
lemma prefix_finI_item[intro!]:
    assumes "a = b" "u \<le> v"
    shows "a # u \<le> b # v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a # u \<le> b # v

proof (prove)
using this:
  a = b
  u \<le> v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a # u \<le> b # v

lemma prefix_finE_item[elim!]:
    assumes "a # u \<le> b # v"
    obtains "a = b" "u \<le> v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lbrakk>a = b; u \<le> v\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  a # u \<le> b # v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lbrakk>a = b; u \<le> v\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<le> u @ v

lemma pprefix_fin_length[dest]:
    assumes "u < v"
    shows "length u < length v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. length u < length v

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. length u < length v
obtain a w where 1: "v = u @ a # w"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>a w. v = u @ a # w \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  u < v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>a w. v = u @ a # w \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  v = u @ a # w

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. length u < length v

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. length u < length v

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. length u < length (u @ a # w)

proof (state)
this:
  length u < length v

goal:
No subgoals!
